SamPy.bolshoi.testLightcone.LogLocator¶

class SamPy.bolshoi.testLightcone.LogLocator(base=10.0, subs=[1.0], numdecs=4)¶

Determine the tick locations for log axes

__init__(base=10.0, subs=[1.0], numdecs=4)¶

place ticks on the location= base**i*subs[j]

Methods

__init__([base, subs, numdecs]) place ticks on the location= base**i*subs[j]
autoscale() autoscale the view limits
base(base) set the base of the log scaling (major tick every base**i, i integer)
create_dummy_axis()
pan(numsteps) Pan numticks (can be positive or negative)
raise_if_exceeds(locs) raise a RuntimeError if Locator attempts to create more than MAXTICKS locs
refresh() refresh internal information based on current lim
set_axis(axis)
set_bounds(vmin, vmax)
set_data_interval(vmin, vmax)
set_view_interval(vmin, vmax)
subs(subs) set the minor ticks the log scaling every base**i*subs[j]
view_limits(vmin, vmax) Try to choose the view limits intelligently
zoom(direction) Zoom in/out on axis; if direction is >0 zoom in, else zoom out
